name: The Little Sushi that Could
description:
The Little Sushi that could is a simple platformer, just a fun quick game! The concept is around making sushi! On each level, the player starts as a simple rice ball and gets ingredients to become a full sushi by the end! Each piece also grants a different power to change the character's movement. Have fun!

This platformer was made with three other people as a class project. My role in the teams was as one of the programmers, focusing on gameplay scripting, like controller and AI. This was my first larger project made, and I was pretty happy with the result of the character controller. Still have a lot to learn, but I think this was a good first step. Critique and feedback very welcome!

Level designer: https://www.linkedin.com/in/eduardo-cavalcante-almeida/

PM and second programmer - https://www.linkedin.com/in/madhur-arora-design/
